name: Bitcoin highway
description:
Collect as much money as you can on Bitcoin Highway.

Bitcoin Highway is an endless runner in which you will be driving a vehicle and collecting as much money as it possible on your way.
Use mouse or keyboard to turn, collect money, unlock new vehicles in your garage and just have fun!

Main features of the game:
  • Different day time
  • 9 vehicles
  • Tons of Steam Achivements
  • Relaxing background music
